strings: <se_high>Jessica: Um, don't you think we should make the ship our first priority? We need to go to Trodain Castle and find out more about it.
<se_high>Jessica: I guess it's okay to take a detour, but we shouldn't waste too much time.
<se_low>Yangus: It was that Dhoulmagus who covered the castle wiv thorns then, eh? There's prob'ly monsters inside.
<se_low>Yangus: Maybe we should go an' do a bit of confessin' in church first, guv. Make sure this Goddess is on our side an' all that. Better safe than sorry!
<se_def>Angelo: You know, we've still got unfinished business at Trodain Castle.

<se_def>Angelo: The troll king said we should go to the library and find out about the ship.
Don't want to disobey orders now!
<se_high>Jessica: So the harp's been stolen from right under the King's nose? Must be a ruthless band of thieves! So where are they!?

<se_high>Jessica: Actually, the real question is, where is the Moonshadow harp?
Where did they hide it?
<se_high>Jessica: It's hard to believe they stole the Moonshadow harp just for the sake of making that racket!

<se_high>Jessica: It's wrong. I mean really wrong!
<Cap><hero>! We've got to get the harp back from that giant mole!
<se_high>Jessica: Who IS this guy!? First he gets his henchmen to help him steal the Moonshadow harp, and then he uses it to torture them! What a monster!

<se_high>Jessica: Well, I won't let him get away with it!
Let's teach that mole a lesson!<page>Jessica: He'll think twice about being such a bully after we've taken his new toy away!
<se_low>Yangus: ...Guv, I'm wond'rin' if maybe this ain't where the 'ideout is? There's somefin' a bit too cosy about the place...

<se_low>Yangus: Still, I could be wrong...
As long as we find the Moonshadow 'arp, I ain't bothered.

<se_low>Yangus: M-Me ears...!
Me ears are killin' me!
I can't take this much longer...!

<se_low>Yangus: That's it! I've 'ad it!
If we don't finish off that big mole geezer soon, I'm gonna end up a nervous wreck!
<se_low>Yangus: It ain't just me ears now, me 'ole body's in agony! This ain't good, guv. I think I'm gonna be sick...
<se_low>Yangus: If we don't sock it to that big mole geezer this time, that ‘music’ of 'is'll be the death o' me!

<se_def>Angelo: Brr, I've got the shivers down here.
Can you hear that horrible noise echoing from down the tunnel?
<se_def>Angelo: It sounds like a monstrous dragon howling, or a hellish demon screaming, or a...a...really horrible thing making a REALLY horrible racket.

<se_def>Angelo: Those poor moles.
They can't hold out much longer...
<se_def>Angelo: And we'll be in trouble too if we don't silence that talentless mole and his truly awful cacophony, pronto!
<se_def>Angelo: It's up to us. We're the only ones who can save those poor, innocent moles from that awful music.

<se_def>Angelo: Trust me, it'll be worth it.
People have to pay you back when they're indebted to you. In theory, anyway.
<se_high>Jessica: I have a question: why do the other moles hang around with that boss of theirs if he torments them with that terrible music?
<se_high>Jessica: Moles are a mysterious lot.
<se_low>Yangus: If I'd 'ad to 'ear just one more note outta that mole, I'm sure it would've finished me off!

<se_low>Yangus: But we made it through, and we got the Moonshadow 'arp back, an' all!
We're on a roll!
<se_def>Angelo: Well, it was hard work but we got the Moonshadow harp back in the end. Still...
<se_def>Angelo: I'm a bit worried that it might be broken after the way that mole was bashing away at it!

<se_high>Jessica: It's too quiet.
Maybe Don Mole's singing finally sent his followers into the sweet hereafter.

<se_low>Yangus: That's weird!
There ain't any of them moles in 'ere no more!
So they did leave after all...
<se_def>Angelo: I don't know. Is it being careful? Conscientious? Distracted? Or just dim-witted...?

<se_def>Angelo: Basically, I have no idea what it is you're thinking!
What on earth are we doing back here!?
<se_high>Jessica: Ah, you must have a thing about heights...
<se_high>Jessica: Hm? Oh, don't mind me. It's nothing.
<se_low>Yangus: That big mole 'elped us out a bit in the end, eh?
<se_low>Yangus: It wouldn't be a bad idea to 'ave a few drinks wiv them moles when all this is over, guv!

<se_def>Angelo: ...I've got it!
You must be scared of heights, right?
<se_def>Angelo: Otherwise why would you drag us into a cave when we're supposed to be fighting in the sky!?
<se_high>Red: Them moles are pretty natty, eh? Must be 'andy bein' able to burrow anywhere ya fancy so fast like that.
<se_high>Red: It'd make 'alf-inchin' stuff a piece o' cake if ya could do that, it really would.
<se_low>Morrie: Ragazzo, what are you doing, ay? Our nemesis is in the skies, not under the ground, capice?
